paper_abstract: In this paper, by a definite linear function for ranking symmetric triangular fuzzy numbers, in a Fuzzy Linear Programming problem (FLP) model, we introduced a Fuzzy Degenerate Solution (FDS). In the physical meaning, occurrence of degeneracy in a Fuzzy Minimal Cost Flow Network is investigated. To prevent of falling into Cycling phenomenon in optimization process, we defined two new techniques of Cycling prevention proper to fuzzy environment.
paper_title: DEGENERACY IN FUZZY LINEAR PROGRAMMING AND ITS APPLICATION
